lines.text:
[voice-over]
Drain out all the water, take in plenty of oil, grease up that back end, get out on the highway and go at full speed for about ten miles. See how it feels.
No-one's ever mentioned this to me before.
Aren't you guys in the wrong room? Shouldn't you be next door at the pro acid rain rally?

[coming into classroom as if he were the instructor]
All right people, settle down, take your seats, thank you...
[to kid wearing red shirt]
That means you too, Red.
[to black man with dredlocks]
Hey man, I've got all your albums, you're the greatest! All right, everybody stand up, please! Everybody up, c'mon!
[to Wink Barnes, who refuses]
You! In the back! You waiting for a special invitation?

[leaning back in his chair]
You talkin' to me?
Yes, you too! Uppity-up-up-up!
[he rises]
You're gonna like this! C'mon! Now, breathe in...
[class members take deep breath in]
... blow out
[they blow out]
. Breathe in, blow out. That's it. Now, shake it out
[all wiggle]
Good.
[Deputies Halik and Morris enter]
Now, if the women will all be so kind as to take off all their clothes, we can get things rolling.
Sit DOWN, Mr. Cannon!
Wait, wait. Could it be?
[to camera]
How big a coincidence is this?
[singing song]
Reunited, 'cause it feels so good!
[class collectively laughs]
We're your traffic school instructors!
Aren't you guys in the wrong room? Shouldn't you be next door at the pro-acid rain rally?
Sit down before I mold your face into an ashtray.
See, all you had to do was ask nicely.

[sitting on the front of a urinal]
What's a man doing in the Ladies Room?
This is the Men's Room, Mrs. Houk.
Oh.
[beat]
Why is my back all wet?
What is this powder?
Fertilizer.

[disgustedly spits it out]
Ughhhh! Shit!
Exactly!
It's like I always say. When the going gets tough, the tough get going in their pants.
You've changed my life! You've taught me a whole new of looking at the law.
Well come on back to my place. I'll show you a whole new way of looking at my body.
So what's it going to be? Boxing? Karate? Wrestling?
Are you kidding? Look, wimp...

[terrified]
Oh, Jesus...
You come on as this big macho strong man. How about a real test of strength? How about arm wrestling?
Sounds good, Cannon. I happen to be Western Division arm wrestling champ, so don't be surprised when I break your arm in two!
Sounds fun. Come on, dickhead!
Ok I got it! First we kill him, then we cut off his face!
Wink, you're a sick man. I thought you should know that.
Are you going to be a good boy?
Yes, mommy, yes!
I hit a casket with a puppet stage. What am I doing here?
I got my promotion.
I got my period.
How can I be a hypochondriac when I'm sick all the time?
So instead of pissing and moaning about how bad off we are, let's zero in on the guy who made sure we'd never drive again. Let's get the guy who screwed us. Let's get Halik!
Yeah fuck him! Rip his nuts off!
By the time you complete this course, you will know all the rules of the road, backwards and forwards.

[raises hand]
Will there be any cooking tips, like what to do with those darned holiday leftovers?

[after throwing a flare in the trunk of a car and setting it ablaze]
Did I do something wrong?
Not from where I stand.

[to Mrs. Houk who is standing watch]
Did you see anybody?
I don't know.
Good.
[Mrs. Houk, who has been drinking, lets out a huge belch]
Before you go home tonight, we'd like to show you a little film on traffic safety called, "Blood Flows Red on the Highway."
All right!

[looking very concerned]
I crashed the Mercedes, my dad is going to kill me!
Hey man, I got an advice for you, go to your local video store, and rent "The Texas Chainsaw Massacre". It will relax you.
Hey, Wink, do us a favor. Try to be a normal person for the next five minutes, okay?
[Dana and Halik are inside the Men's room; Dana attempts to make amends with Halik by apologizing and shaking hands]
Hey, look. I think we've got off on the wrong foot, and I'm sorry. Why don't we shake hands and wipe the slate clean?
[Halik angrly shoves Dana against the wall]
I hate your ass.
Oh, come on. This has gone too far.

[furious]
Shut up! I'm teaching this shithead class 'cause you got me demoted! That's right. You screwed up my promotion, my career. And now I'm gonna screw thing up for you.
Sounds fair.
You just watch yourself.

[cracks his right knuckle]
I'll crush you.
Okay, but just long as we can still be friends, okay?

[whining]
Dad, are we there yet? I'm hungry.
Shut up!
[Halik pees in his pants as an 18 wheeler crashes into the traffic school's Chevrolet Malibu test car]
When the going gets tough, the tough get going in their pants.
[Amy, Wink, and Jeff laughs; Halik covers his area]
None of you will ever see your cars again.
[Upon seeing the wrecked track, caused by Scott and rigged by Halik, the class automatically fails the course; The class walks from the course feeling devastated]
We didn't do so hot.
How about "We all failed"?
My God, we're never gonna drive again.
I don't believe it.
That's it. My Dad's coming back in town tomorrow. I'm dead
[Halik and Morris approaches]
Too bad. Tough break. If I were you, I'd get used to public transportation.
[the class are all at Dana's place, drinking beer and sulking in sadness]
I'm in the car business and I can't drive.
We're screwed. We got shafted.
My Dad's gonna kill me.
Not if we get to him first.
Let's face it. We're never gonna drive again.

It's not over till it's over! Look at Michael Jackson. His hair caught on fire. Did he give up? No. He called the fire department and went on a Victory tour. All right. Now instead of pissing and moaning about how bad off we are, let's zero in on the guy who made sure we'd never drive again. Let's get the guy who screwed us. Let's get Halik!

[drunk]
Yeah, fuck him! Rip his nuts off!
All right, I think she's had enough to drink, but she's right. Let's get some beers. Let's go get him! Come on! Right now!
I work at NASA, I am a rocket scientist.

[trying a pickup line]
So. What's your favorite chainsaw massacre?
Hi
Hi
Did you see Friday The 13th?
No, no, I haven't.
Well, what about the 13th... two, three, or four? What about five?
Missed them all!
Well, that's too bad... they were great. Hey, hey... did you like it more when Clint Eastwood got his hand carved off, or when the seven hands came out of the scar face?
Let's see... oh, there's my bus, I gotta go!
Nice talking to you.
This should be good. Stay tuned.
